Natalya & Devon

Newton Farm

228 Spruceton Rd
• West Kill, NY 12492

Newton Farm is an historic 1860 farm owned by chef and restaurateur Lynn Loflin and her husband Stu and son Ian.

Lynn graciously agreed to host and cater our wedding. It has been a pleasure to collaborate with her and we’re grateful for all of her good ideas and good sense.

How to Get There
